alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:17AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sussex County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ellendale, or 10 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milton and Ellendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Little to no cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm but could develop at any time. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
